text:
Hello,
Please include attached to p4 optional tasks distribution. The attached can 
print differences between local source repository and p4 repository and report 
on files that still not under revision control.

regards
creator: miha@softhome.net
levylambert@tiscali-dsl.de
text:
Created attachment 4300
fixed paths of source files and added standard Apache copyright

creator: conor@apache.org
text:
Antoine, Thanks for the updated files. 

I would like, however, an explicit confirmation from the original submitter
(Mike?) that he wishes to assign the copyright on this code to the Apache
Software Foundation.

Thanks

creator: conor@apache.org
text:
OK, thanks for that

I have the code ready to commit (a few style changes) but I do have some concern
about the use of Swing to display progress. Ant tasks generally do not use a
GUI. In particular, I think some Unix users may have issues creating the GUI
classes when they do not have an X server.

creator: levylambert@tiscali-dsl.de
text: I share your concerns, may be you should remove the swing progress display before you commit ?

creator: conor@apache.org
text:
Committed without the Swing progress bar. If you wish to add this back in you
could define an interface (not swing based) and have the Swing based version
implement this interface. You would then instantiate the swing version
dynamically based on a new attribute - something along those lines, anyway.

Can you test it works as committed.
